title: Inkstand, 1760s–80s
markings: Signed with pseudo Olerys monogram and Samson "S" in underglaze brown, green, and ochre.
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Shaped inkstand (a) with separate inkpot (b) with lid (c), and sander (d); green and ochre decoration of flowers, foliage, and figure. Sampson in the style of 18th-century Moustiers.

tombstone.epitaph: Inkstand, 1760s–80s. Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-6-a/d.
